message.content:
cs.FL, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.IT, cs.LO

Reasoning: 
- cs.FL (Formal Languages and Automata Theory) is the most likely category as the paper deals with problems related to the free monoid and languages generated by a finite set of words. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) is also likely as the paper discusses the computational complexity of the problems and provides lower and upper bounds on the length of words. 
- cs.CC (Computational Complexity) is relevant as the paper settles the complexity questions of the two problems. 
- cs.IT (Information Theory) is relevant as the paper discusses the concept of set rewriting systems. 
- cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science) is relevant as the paper deals with the Restivo's open question, which is related to logic and formal languages.
